name: To Hell with it (itch)
description:
A short rogulike made in 4 days for GameMaker's Community GameJam...

A long time ago, our Lord, in order to create man, needed to experiment. And he did. Oh, those pitiful creatures; those pathetic abominations...

 They were thrown to the deepest levels of hell never to be seen again...

No love. No hope.

You are one of them.

SAVE YOUR KIND!

(Note: the new file is exactly the same as the previous one, just in different form (.exe) and with a different name)
